mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.HERO_NAME FROM GM_USER_HERO A LEFT JOIN GM_HERO_INFO B ON A.HERO_ID = B.HERO_ID WHERE A.`STATUS` = '1' AND A.MINT_HASH = #{mintHash}

SELECT A.USER_HERO_ID, A.EXPERIENCE_OBTAIN, A.HERO_POWER, B.HERO_NAME, B.HERO_IMG_URL, B.HERO_ICON_URL, B.HERO_KEEL_URL, B.HERO_DESCRIPTION, F.LEVEL_CODE FROM GM_USER_HERO A LEFT JOIN GM_HERO_INFO B ON A.HERO_ID = B.HERO_ID LEFT JOIN GM_HERO_LEVEL F ON A.HERO_LEVEL_ID = F.HERO_LEVE_ID ${ew.customSqlSegment}
